animal.question: I meow and like to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🐾 I have soft paws.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 I like to fetch.
🏡 I live in a kennel.

animal.question: I say 'Moo' and give milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat grass.
⚫ I have black and white spots.
🚜 Farmers keep me.

animal.question: I quack and waddle when I walk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I eat corn.
💦 I like to swim in ponds.
🐣 My babies are called ducklings.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest mammal on Earth.
🌍 I live in Africa.
🌿 I love to eat acacia leaves.

animal.question: I roar and I'm known as the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a big mane.
🐾 I am a big cat.
☀️ I sleep during the day.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes are unique to each individual.
🌿 I eat grass and leaves.
🦁 Lions love to hunt me.

animal.question: I hop and carry my baby in a pouch. What am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I live in Australia.
🦵 I have strong legs for jumping.
🌱 I eat plants.

animal.question: I have a trunk and big ears. I like peanuts. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts!
🐘 I am a very large animal.
💧 I use my trunk to drink water.

animal.question: I am green and have a bumpy skin. I live in rivers and have a big mouth with sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🐊 I am a reptile.
☀️ I like to bask in the sun.
🚣 Be careful on your boat!

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm white and fluffy. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm cold!
☃️ You can make a snowman with me.
🌬️ I come when it's very cold outside.

weather.question: I make the sun hide, and sometimes it rains. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am made of water drops!
🌫️ I'm usually grey or white.
☔ I float in the sky.

weather.question: I come from the sky and make plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 You need an umbrella when I fall.
🌱 Plants love me.
🌧️ Pitter-patter, pitter-patter.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow and give light during the day. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I shine very bright!
🔥 I can make you feel warm.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.

weather.question: I make the leaves dance in the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong.
💨 I can blow your hat off.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.

weather.question: I'm a colorful arc in the sky after it rains. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
✨ You can only see me when the sun is shining and it's raining!
🎨 Red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, violet.

weather.question: I am very loud and bright, and I come with thunder. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I happen during a storm!
💥 I'm a flash of light in the sky.
🌩️ Be careful when I'm around.

weather.question: I am a loud booming sound that comes after lightning. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 You can hear me but not see me.
🌩️ I follow a flash of light!
🙉 Dogs and cats might be scared of me.

weather.question: I am frozen raindrops falling from the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am like tiny ice balls.
🤕 It can hurt if I fall on your head.
🥶 Sometimes, there are no clouds in the sky when I fall.

weather.question: I'm a swirling storm with strong winds that forms over warm ocean waters. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have a name given to me.
🌊 I can cause lots of damage.
🌬️ I spin around and around.
